column4: Hi! I want to ask what driver should I use with Radeon X1650,  fglrx or radeonhd?  ...I'm running on vesa at the moment...and it's rather slow
fglrx, radeonhd isn't ready yet I think
and is fglrx stable? cause friend told me it locks his PC on boot...
It's as stable as you'll get for now :)
